00025 #ifndef _BASE_SUMEXPRESSION_
00026 #define _BASE_SUMEXPRESSION_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/BinaryOpExpression>
00030 
00031 
00032 namespace base {
00033 
00034 
00035 //
00036 // Sum operator - adds args
00037 //
00038 
00039 class SumExpression : public BinaryOpExpression 
00040 {
00041 public:
00042   SumExpression(ref<ExpressionNode> left, ref<ExpressionNode> right)
00043     : BinaryOpExpression(left, right) {}
00044   SumExpression(const SumExpression& e)
00045     : BinaryOpExpression(e) {}
00046 
00047   virtual NodeType type() const { return NodeType(BinaryOp|Sum); } 
00048 
00049   virtual Object& clone() const { return *NewObj SumExpression(*this); }
00050   virtual String className() const { return String("SumExpression"); }
00051 
00052   virtual String toString() const { return String("(")+leftArg->toString() + "+" + rightArg->toString()+")"; }
00053 
00054 protected:
00055   SumExpression() {}
00056 
00057   virtual void cacheValue(const Vector& params) const
00058     { value = leftArg->evaluate(params) + rightArg->evaluate(params); valueCached=true; }
00059 
00060   virtual void cacheDerivative(Int withRespectToIndex) const
00061     {
00062       derivative = ref<ExpressionNode>(NewObj SumExpression(leftArg->differentiate( withRespectToIndex ),
00063                                                             rightArg->differentiate( withRespectToIndex )) ); 
00064       derivWithRespToIndex = withRespectToIndex;
00065       derivCached = true;
00066     }
00067 
00068   virtual void operationCounts(Int& addsub, Int& multdiv, Int& trig) const 
00069     { BinaryOpExpression::operationCounts(addsub,multdiv,trig); addsub++; }
00070   
00071   friend class Serializable::SerializableDerivedInstantiator<SumExpression>;
00072 };
00073 
00074 } // base
00075 
00076 #endif
